entries.title: What is Firefox Nightly and should you be using it?
entries.description: If you're looking to get the newest (sometimes experimental) features in your browser, Firefox Nightly might be what you need.

entries.title: Australia, Singapore firms amongst most likely to halt digital transformation due to cyberwarfare risks
entries.description: Organisations in Australia, the US, and Singapore are amongst the top most likely to stall their digital transformation initiatives due to cyberwarfare threats, above the global average of 55%.

entries.title: Earth will have a close encounter with an asteroid this week
entries.description: NASA predicts that the asteroid will make one of the closest approaches by a known near-Earth object ever recorded. However, it poses no harm to mankind.

entries.title: Get a year of Peacock for only $30
entries.description: Ready to catch up on all-things Pawnee? This deal can have you laughing with Knope in no time. See special code.

entries.title: The 5 best indoor gardens of 2023
entries.description: Growing your own herbs is easier than ever. The best indoor gardens have autonomous watering and automatic light modes so you can easily grow your own garden.

entries.title: Bowers & Wilkins' Pi7 S2 are music to my ears, but there's a catch
entries.description: Improved connectivity, longer battery life, and some of the best audio output I've heard still don't make the Pi7 S2 an impulse buy, for reasons beyond my control.

entries.title: DOJ takes down ransomware group with a '21st century cyber stakeout'
entries.description: Authorities have disrupted the Hive ransomware group by infiltrating its computer networks and capturing its decryption keys, saving victims over $100 million in ransom payments.

entries.title: I tried to charge my Tesla with Anker's PowerHouse 767. Here’s what happened
entries.description: Is it possible to charge a Tesla with Anker's latest PowerHouse power station? Yes! Should you? That's debatable, but it didn't stop us from trying.

entries.title: Razer's Edge Gaming handheld now available in Wi-Fi and 5G flavors
entries.description: The company's long-teased, Android-based portable console is now available, and we finally know how much the 5G version exclusive to Verizon Warless will cost.

entries.title: How to take a screenshot on Android
entries.description: Taking a screenshot on your Android phone is a convenient way to keep information handy. Here's everything you need to know.

entries.title: How to cool your Raspberry Pi (and should you?)
entries.description: Does your Raspberry Pi need additional cooling?

entries.title: 3 security gadgets I never leave home without
entries.description: These gadgets give you a huge advantage over the hackers.

entries.title: How to add multiple keyboards to the Gmail web app
entries.description: If you need to use different languages for different email recipients, Gmail has you covered with the Input Tools option.

entries.title: Singapore to tag unregistered SMS senders as 'likely scam'
entries.description: Businesses not registered with the Singapore SMS Sender ID Registry by January 31 will have their messages labelled as "Likely-SCAM", as the country rolls out more measures to combat online scams.

entries.title: How to change your username in Windows 11
entries.description: You can change the name for a local account and also for a Microsoft account through Windows 11.

entries.title: How to pair Bose Bluetooth headphones to any device
entries.description: Skip the pairing frustration like you would a bad '90s pop ballad: Here's how to successfully pair your Bose headphones with everything from an iPhone to a Windows PC.

entries.title: NSA and CISA alert: This phishing scam could give hackers control of your PC
entries.description: Cyber criminals are convincing people to install legitimate remote monitoring software - which they use to steal money from victims.

entries.title: ChatGPT can write code. Now researchers say it's good at fixing bugs too
entries.description: A developer's new best friend? ChatGPT is up with the best when it comes to automatically debugging code. But whether it saves developers' time or creates more work remains to be seen.

entries.title: How to trade in your old devices for Amazon gift cards
entries.description: Here's a simple way to jumpstart your spring decluttering and get paid for it.

entries.title: The developer role is changing radically, and these figures show how
entries.description: Data from Github suggests there are now more developers than ever. Here's what has changed.

entries.title: Microsoft is testing this neat split-screen tabs feature for its Edge browser
entries.description: Microsoft could soon give users a handy way to compare the content of two tabs in its Edge browser.
